content.en: Evolutionary Optimization: Researchers are exploring how evolutionary algorithms can optimize system-level synthesis in heterogeneous hardware/software architecture. They are also investigating the advantages of using evolutionary algorithms for automatic circuit design, high-level synthesis, and hardware-software partitioning. Additionally, they are studying the benefits of using other algorithms such as particle swarm optimization, quantum-inspired evolutionary algorithms, and metaheuristic algorithms for various aspects of embedded system design.
content.da: Evolutionær optimering: Forskere undersøger, hvordan evolutionære algoritmer kan optimere systemniveau-syntese i heterogen hardware/software-arkitektur. De undersøger også fordelene ved at bruge evolutionære algoritmer til automatisk kredsløbsdesign, høj-niveau-syntese og hardware-software-partitionering. Derudover studerer de fordele ved at bruge andre algoritmer som partikel-sværmoptimering, kvante-inspirerede evolutionære algoritmer og metaheuristiske algoritmer til forskellige aspekter af indlejret systemdesign.
